ing: 7 radishes, cut into 1/4-inch chunks, or more to taste
des: "Festive red, white, and green colors can be used at Christmas time, but are great all year-round! Ingredients are flexible amounts. Serve as a condiment to go with beans or as a spread to go with chips."
ins: Mix radishes, cilantro, onion, ginger, oil, jalapeno pepper, and lime juice together in a bowl.
